treatment.description: Perennials, 5–20 cm (cespitose, bases sometimes woody). Stems erect, ± tomentose. Leaves mostly basal; blades (± cuneate, 8–20 mm) usually 1–2-pinnati-palmately lobed (ultimate lobes ± linear), faces ± tomentose. Heads usually 8–20 in tight, capitate arrays (1–1.3 cm across), sometimes with solitary heads proximal to main arrays. Involucres (2–)3–4 mm. Phyllaries 5–8, tomentose. Receptacles glabrous. Cypselae 1–2 mm (3–5-ribbed, apices with thickened rims, faces glabrous or sparsely gland-dotted).
